message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_BIRTHDATE_STARTDATE
message.locale: A birth date has been specified for the prospect person. Foreign Residency start date cannot be before this date.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_FV_COUNTRYCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Country/Region Code must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_SEARCH_RECORDSFOUND
message.locale: The prospect person is already resident in %1c during this period.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New foreign residency details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Foreign Residency details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSONFOREIGNRESIDENCY_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Foreign residency details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
